definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Solitary Beauty Peak locates in Guilin Prince City and is an integral part of the Prince City scenic area.
sentences.chinese: 獨秀峯位於桂林王城內，是王城景區不可分割的部分。

sentences.english: The land was separated into small pieces.
sentences.chinese: 那塊田被分割成小塊田地。

sentences.english: But within reason, flirting is part and parcel of our daily lives.
sentences.chinese: 但當然了，調情是我們日常生活中不可分割的一部分。

sentences.english: This fragmentation of relationship is the degenerating factor in our life.
sentences.chinese: 關係的分割是我們生命中的墮落因素。

sentences.english: We do some research on binarization of gray image and character segmentation.
sentences.chinese: 研究了灰度文本圖像二值化及字符分割。

sentences.english: Experiments with imago and larva locust images is segmented.
sentences.chinese: 實驗對成蟲與幼蟲圖像均進行分割。

sentences.english: Circular interpolation of time-sharing algorithm is that circular arc is approached with tangent or chord line.
sentences.chinese: 時間分割法圓弧插補用切線或絃線來逼近圓弧。

sentences.english: He's part of that Pink Panther group that held up a jewelry store in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 他是在巴黎開珠寶店的粉紅豹不可分割的一部分。

sentences.english: This paper pays attention to the application of 3D segmentation technology to plastic surgery.
sentences.chinese: 研究三維分割技術在醫學整形領域的應用。

sentences.english: Currently, algorithms based on graph cut take pixels as vertexes, therefore, real-time of segmentation is poor.
sentences.chinese: 由於加權圖的頂點規模較大，因此分割實時性較差。

sentences.english: The feasibility of the proposed method was verified by division of the southwest corridor in China.
sentences.chinese: 用大西南通道分割的實例驗證了方法的可行性。

sentences.english: Can divide the inside space freewill, more convenient to store foods.
sentences.chinese: 可對包內進行任意的分割，更有利於食品的儲放。

sentences.english: We draw adiabats that divide the cycle into adjacent strips.
sentences.chinese: 我們畫許多絕熱線將循環分割成若干相鄰的狹條。

sentences.english: The landings called for an assault on a five-divisional front.
sentences.chinese: 登陸要求在五條分割的戰線上進行突擊。

sentences.english: And is not time even as love is, undivided and paceless?
sentences.chinese: 難道時間不就像愛，是不可分割沒有間隙的麼？

sentences.english: Split the lateral surface edge with Split edge command.
sentences.chinese: 斯普利特的側面邊指揮邊分割。

definition: one divides into two/to be two-sided/there are two sides to everything/to see both sb's good points and shortcomings (idiom)
to divide (into)/to split a bonus/to break into/tenths/percentage allotment
to cut apart/to sever/to separate/to isolate
to differentiate/to draw a distinction/to divide into categories
to overlap/to superimpose/to telescope/to run together/to duplicate/one over another/superposition/an overlap/redundancy/reduplication (in Chinese grammar, e.g. 散散步[san4 san4 bu4] to have a stroll)
